alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 9:30AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. .Rises are expected to continue on the Sheyenne River over the next few days. Major flooding is anticipated to begin within the next 12 hours. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Sunday was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.0 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
